
# Food Delivery Platform ‚Äì Funnel Analysis & Report
üóì Project Overview
In June 2024, I conducted a funnel analysis for a food delivery platform that was grappling with fluctuating order rates and traffic drops, both negatively impacting revenue and customer satisfaction. The objective was to uncover the causes of these fluctuations and develop actionable strategies to improve platform performance.

üìù Key Challenges
üìâ Order Fluctuations: Erratic order rates were destabilizing revenue streams.
üö® Traffic Decline: Significant drops in platform traffic led to reduced customer engagement and satisfaction.
üéØ Project Goals
üîé Conversion Analysis: Investigate how conversion rates were affecting order patterns.
üìä Traffic Optimization: Identify the reasons behind traffic drops and recommend strategies to mitigate them.

üìä Results Achieved
üöÄ 52% Reduction in Fluctuations: Successfully reduced order rate fluctuations and traffic drops by 52%.
üìà Enhanced Platform Stability: Implemented strategies led to improved traffic management and overall platform stability.
üõçÔ∏è Improved Customer Satisfaction: More efficient customer journeys increased conversion rates, boosting customer satisfaction and revenue.
